name: Harrison Communications Company
tag_list: public-relations, press-release, press-releases, pr, marketing, advertising, tech-pr, financial-pr, healthcare-pr, media-relations
overview:
Since 2009, the management team of Harrison Communications Company has been implementing media strategies designed to enable clients to stay ahead of the competition and to offer new avenues to enhance their corporate images.

Our strength lies in gaining a thorough understanding of our clients—including start-ups, franchises, technology, medical, energy, private and public companies, mid-sized companies and large corporations—and their strategic business goals, and developing public relations campaigns that deliver results. 

We offer big agency results balanced with small firm attention, with a full range of public relations services.  

Our media portfolio speaks for itself—we have placed our clients in articles ranging from business stories in Chicago Tribune, Reuters, Crain’s Communications Company, Wall Street Journal, New York Times, New York Post, and USA Today to consumer features in Family Business Magazine, Directors & Boards, Denver Post, Philadelphia Inquirer, Indianapolis Star, Minneapolis Star Tribune, Detroit Free Press, and more.  

This publicity would translate into millions of dollars if it appeared in an advertising format. As seasoned media specialists, we have a true understanding of why good publicity can translate into potential sales.
